page.title: 11Education, Ashford Carbonell
page.content: The school was built in 1872.Now we're living in 1985 so the school has been going for 113 years.We have sports at this school including football,netball,cricket,tennis and rounders.At Christmas time we have a play.Then we have a Christmas party.We also have a party in July for the 4th. years who leave Ashford school to go to secondary school.And sometimes we go on outtings.We do projects during the year.We have our own school computer.On Monday, Wednesday,and Friday mornings a playgroup for 3-5yr old children uses the village hall. When the older children of playgroup leave, they go on to the Infants and then on to the Juniors,and then after that they usually go to Ludlow school.In 1985 there are 46 children at Ashford school.The 24 Juniors use the original
